title: clash btw
body: Let's cancel the one gamemode that everyone is looking forward to and give the people the other gamemode which makes a significant chunk of our playerbase quit after playing it :^]

replies.body: I'm sorry you can't pick up on my sarcasm, given the sub board its in?
Uh, I wasn't lookin forward to it, last I checked I was part of everyone.
im liking ARURF more than i ever enjoyed the clash beta
Lets cancel the gamemode that has a function problem and least try to give people something to do while we attempt to fix it xDDDDDDD
